column4: Im on Ubuntu Feisty.. deicided its too unstable.. how I go back to Edgy?
I have to format the whole thing :-(
Bummer
Did you backup your system?
If you are installing beta software, I reccomend a backup in the future. It will save you a lot of headaches
Didnt think it would be this bad
What problems are you having?
https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/totem/+bug/104651
ouch
and the mythtv backend segfaulted
You may have to uninstall and then re-install
backup everything you have saved on it so you can keep it of course
rsync is your friend
Wish there was a way to get a list of packages that I have installed that DONT come as standard
then I could make a apt-get list when i reinstall
hmmm, I bet I could do that in emacs...that's a good idea
I wouldn't uninstall the whole system just mythtv
Hows that gonna help, I will still have a unstable mythtv
I found sometimes an update will break a package but a re-install will stablize it
acidrip broke on me when I upgraded then a uninstalled and reinstalled and it's been fine for instance
heh cool.. well i did upgrade from edgy
I know. I do it to. That's why I back things up now.
